subject: Soccer
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: Brian Ching, Houston’s leading scorer this postseason, is doubtful for Sunday’s championship game against New England as he tries to quickly recover from a strained calf muscle in his left leg.
snippet: Brian Ching, Houston’s leading scorer this postseason, is doubtful for Sunday’s championship game against New England as he tries to quickly recover from a strained calf muscle in his left leg.
